modName: Blade of Sacrifice for aMidianBorn Book of Silence users
summary: A retexture of the Blade of Sacrifice to match CaBaL120's gold ebony.
descriptionHtml:
Still working on gold ebony weapons, slow going because there's a lot of small detail work and I can't color outside the lines like I did with my black ebony textures. I did however finish this one and I'm releasing it as an early sneak peek. :) The Amidian version uses the cubemaps included in CaBaL120's ebony armor variants and will not work without it. For other users, the Humus version comes with its own cubemap and needs no other mods.

Credits: Meshes by LeanWolf from his better shaped weapons mod, and cubemap for the Humus version by, well, Humus, and adapted to Skyrim by billyro.
LeanWolf http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870/?
Humus/billyro http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81213/?
author: spaceshark
